issue.title: [Website] Tidy use of and linking to Arrow logo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15786](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15786). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that ARROW-15684 is merged, it would make sense to be consistent in how the Arrow logo is used on the website, and to link to the Visual Identity page where appropriate (e.g., there is a natural place to link to it from the Powered By page). In addition to improving the cross-linking between pages, look for cases where the site can use the updated files rather than the outdated ones (but do not delete the outdated files)

comments.body:

This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
